text: he eemaan vaalo! tumamen se jo apane dharm se phir jaayega, to allaah (usake sthaan par) aise logon ko paida kar dega, jinase vah prem karega aur ve usase prem karenge. ve eemaan vaalon ke lie komal tatha kaafiron ke lie kade[1] honge, allaah kee raah mein jihaad karenge, kisee ninda karane vaale kee ninda se nahin darenge. ye allaah kee daya hai, jise chaahe pradaan karata hai aur allaah (kee daya) vishaal hai aur vah ati gyaanee hai
